userreviews.userReview: Lots of great ideas for parties - especially Halloween parties!
I want to make the jello worms in "dirt" and the red rice krispies treats that look like raw meat for my birthday. And leave them in the staff room. For everyone to enjoy.

description: What can be as yucky to look at as it is yummy to eat? Your dessert! Learn how to make a variety of desserts that are both repulsive and tasty. Create dishes like worms in dirt, gooey alien limbs, and "poisoned" apples. Baking dessert has never been so much fun--or so gross!
title: Cat Litter Cake and Other Horrifying Desserts
